tool_description: Top NFTs and collections sold today, this week, or this month.
name: Top NFT Sales
title: Top NFT Sales

api_list.name: Top NFTs this Month
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-nft-sales.p.rapidapi.com/sales/30d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-nft-sales.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
